internalIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier used to identify data associated with this recording within the file or file bundle.

name._instruction: Enter a name for this recording.

channel._instruction: Enter all the recording channels contained in this recording.

samplingFrequency._instruction: Sampling frequency (inverted of time step) of data.

previousRecording._instruction: If this recording is part of a sequence (sweeps, repetitions), enter the previous recording.

additionalRemarks._instruction: Enter any additional remarks about this recording.

recordedWith._instruction: Add the device used for this recording.

dataLocation._instruction: Add the location of the file or file bundle in which the recorded data is stored.
